content.detailedDescription: At approx. time 1115pm  came home from work i-84 had state police cars out on highway working crew on ct. i-84 east bound manch, ct. 06042 saw a large bigger than football fiels pulsating light and reported to newengland mufon but it is not showing up in last 25 reports... so the night unsure but witnesses at work confirmed same thing in manch, ct. when told about incident tonight at work at 10pm on 10-23-2011 3 witnesses from manch, said the same thiing check out a slight rain -drizzle and i drove around area and it moved north toward bradley airport windsor locks and vanished. please post again find old report has date and time thanks. ufo perhaps not ours due to storm and it wasn't life star helicopter in manch, ct. and not an black hawk helicopter to large pulsating thru clouds following along electrical made my wife nervous she heard it.... thanks
content.summary: Came home off i-84 east noticed a huge bright light in cloud hovering just above clouds humming sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard waiting for my dog to do his thing i gazed up into the norther sky and noticed a commercial jet flying south. i was looking in a southwest direction. 

i just happened to take my eyes off the plane and saw what looked like a star, but it was moving. that's when i noticed it.

at first i thought it might be a satellite or the iss.

it was bluish white, i couldn't make out any structure, but there were no hazard or warning lights blinking. using the horizon as the six oclock position, it was at 3oclock moving from southwest to the south.

my feeling was oh no here we go again, i have seen similar objects in the past, totaling 4 times, i even videotaped one event that happened july of 2010. 

i lost sight of the object as it headed south. it just seemed to fly off in the distance. this all took place in about 12 to 15 seconds.
content.summary: At 6:55pm on oct 24 2011 i saw what appeared to be a star moving from a southwest to a southeast direction.

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:30 p.M. on 10/24/11, went out on my front porch to look directly above to see a red non-reflective cloud-like 'mist' (i say this because you could see through it...There were airplanes flying in the sky that were flying well above the area of 'mist' and you could see them through the red in the sky.  there were actually two of the same type of red cloud-like are--one was on the north east side and the other was on the north west side of the sky.  the only areas that were 'misty' were the two red areas.  the rest of the sky was crystal clear--no clouds only sky and stars.

when i stepped outside and faced north, the red 'mist' that was on the north west side of the sky was in one spot and when i stepped back inside for just a second, and came back outside, it had moved quite a bit to the left.  the person i was with said that this movement had also happened just prior to me coming outside to see it for the first time. 

perhaps it is was the aurora borialis?  it began to fade and eventually faded to the point where you couldn't really see it anymore.  i tried to locate the source and drove around for a while, but there was nothing that would have explained the light.  it appeared to be coming down from the sky rather than a light that was reflecting upward into the sky, which can sometimes cause a reflection against the clouds, but again there were no clouds only these two 'misty' red areas.

we took a few pictures, but i don't know if anything showed up on the images as of yet.
content.summary: Red cloud-like non-reflective 'mist'

content.detailedDescription: My wife, son and i observed 4 glowing reddish-orange lights moving toward lansing from the west-southwest.  one was ahead and seemed to slow and move upward, then it disappeared.  the first light was followed closely (maybe 1/2 mile behind) then came two lights moving side by side together.  they all seemed to come to the same location and disappear.  we thought that maybe they were weather ballons.  they were absolutely silent.
content.summary: 4 lights moving w-sw to e-ne

content.detailedDescription: It was around 2:30 am., i fell asleep watching tv. a humming or whirring noise woke me up. i went out to porch, the ufo was hovering above my neighbors trailer across the street. i ran back in the house, locked the door. aliens came and tried to get at me from outside. i called my dad to come help me and he didnt believe it was happening. i ran in the middle of my house, not knowing which direction the aliens were going to come from to get me. i tried numerous time to call 911 but my cell phone kept going off. i finally got through to 911 and the dispatcher laughed and asked me how much i had to drink that night. (i wasnt drunk,drinking or on drugs) i have pictures printed from my cell phone, its grainy but you can see the ufo. i also have the original cell phone with original photos taken.
content.summary: Woke me up. called 911 for help.

content.detailedDescription: On a summer night in 1986 around 2: am i was lay on the hood of my car outside my girl friend's building's window, a buddy was sleeping in my car. suddenly and slowly a large black triangle shaped object came over the near by building it made no sound and had red and green lights on it. i watched it fly over the buildings and down the street. i ran to wake up my friend  by the time he was awake and looking it was over the varranzano bridge he said "where i don't see it" i point to the bridge and said "over there" as he said "do you mean those lights over the bridge?" suddenly the object shot away to the left leaving a shadowy motion blur.
content.summary: I saw a ufo over staten island ny

content.detailedDescription: time about 6: or 6:15pm.  i was flying my rc airplane in the old collin county park.  i saw black object traveling just below the high clouds. the front was just about to get here and their were high white broken clouds standing almost still with lower dark broken clouds traveling north. it looked almost like a black balloon that was rotating in a horizontal motion. about one turn per two seconds.  it was coming from the south almost over head.  when it got to the north of me it turned back to the west in a broad turn.  i brought my plane down right away and yelled for my wife to look and she got a brief look at it.
content.summary: Odd shaped black object rotating as it crossed the sky

content.detailedDescription: I stopped with my wife for some drinks at the roadrunner market, off of exit 69 in blountville, tn. it was nearing 7:30pm on october 24th 2011. upon leaving the store and returning to our car, i tried starting the car and it wouldn't start. the strage thing was i have never had trouble starting it before, also the lights were still on in the car or i would have believed it to be the battery. i left my car and went back inside asking for help from the employees because, i have no jumper cables. the employees didn't have any either so one of them left to go across the street and borrow some from advance auto. as i stood on the sidewalk of the store facing an arby's, i seen a strange and rather large for a plane glowing white ball descending from the sky. being rather close to an airport, i first thought it was a plane but.. it was coming down oddly slow and away from the airport. as it fell, there were small fireball typr things ejecting from it like a normal meteor would. but as it got to the tree tops...It shot straight up super quick and i lost it almost instantly in the clouds. i didn't try my car again until after they had boosted it..But, it did work. i posted about it on facebook and a friend of mine replied saying he had seen the same thing at the same time while driving on fort henry drive in kingsport!!
content.summary: I was at the roadrunner market off exit 69, my car wouldn't start (no problem before) i seen a glowing ball looked to be falling with pieces of fire coming off of it and larger than any meteor i've seen..When it got to tree top it shot almost straight up

content.detailedDescription:
Appr. 7.45 pm on 10/24/2011 a friend of mine called me and asked me about a strange light in the east north east sky.  i walked out side and viewed the object and advised him it was a planet.  as i was standing outside talking to him on the phone while staring up at the beautiful night sky i noticed an object at a very high altitude that to me appeared to be a satellite i have viewed many satellites and am very aware of them there speed etc. this object was moving very slowly in a north east direction it then made an abrupt turn north, this got my attention.  i may be wrong but to my knowledge satellites do not move this slow nor do they make abrupt turns. as a visual reference there was also a high altitude airliner flying over. these object were higher than the plane. in my opinion they were out of our atmosphere.  as the object turned north it approached what appeared to be a star that wasn,t moving as the object got closer the second object gave off a very bright beam of light and moved at an extremely high rate of speed and was gone in less than a second. the second object moved away in a south east direction.  as the second object gave off it's beam the first object again changed direction back more east north east at a higher rate of speed than first noted. no further action was noted.  

    to let you know i'm not a nut i am a retired police officer(detective) an an u.S. airforce veteran.  yes i was an s. p. stationed at raf bentwaters/woodbridge during that event. 1979-1981.  feel free to contact me if you wish.  i would like to find out what this was.
content.summary: Satellite type object ,change directions, approached another object that at the time was stationary as it approached the stationary moved giving off a beam of light and moved from stationary to a very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
8:04 pm est
oct 24, 2011
garner, nc

i was out front of my home looking up and then all of a sudden noticed a orange orb and it was going north and then south and almost did a figure 8.  then to the north, another orb appeared almost in the same direction.  and then i hear this loud roar from a jet.  most likely coming to find these objects.  both disappeared after 5 minutes and it's now 8:11 pm  and they have not come back.
content.summary: Orange/red orb flying around in figure eight

content.detailedDescription: I had driven over to a friends' house as i pulled up to the curb i noticed a very bright light in the sky. i thought it was a police coptr with a searchlight but the light was way way brighter than any i'd seen before. as it got closer it then looked to be "a large bowl of fire" about the size of 2 billboards or maybe a blimp,"like the goodyear or metlife blimps". i knocked on the door to have my friend see this. as we watched it "floated " in a northeast direction. after a minute or two it dimmed and than shot upwards at a rate i've never seen before.I haden't even noticed that it wasn't my friend but his roommate until afterwards.What i felt mostly was wow. iknew and know that i had a close-up ufo sighting. not just some fast lights in the sky. it made me remember some old sightings where they had described a ufo as a bowl of fire  and some theorists thought that maybe rocket or jet exhaust but this really looked like a huge bowl of red hot fire was flying across the sky without a sound. d.
content.summary: Saw what looked to be a very bright searchlight on a copter moving west to east  when it got closer it looked like a bowl of fire . no noise as it  flew at a point it dimmed and then shot up at unreal speed

content.detailedDescription: Green red and blue flashing lights usually in the shape of a triangle. they like to hover over our pasture above the horses. the horses don't seem to mind them, however my children like to look at them altogether but will not try to observe them alone. we hear a very distinct humming when they are near and they sometimes seem to jam the cell phone for pictures. the most resent was up the street from our house and hovered for a while and then shot staight up in the sky and disapeared. i saw this while driving and turned around to get a better view but it was already gone. my son was screaming for me to take him home he did not want to be anywhere near the object. back in january i was laying down ready for bed when one shot a light into our house and continued the beam for about 2 hours into my eyes. i was trying to sleep, after getting tired of the light i moved to get out of the light. the light moved with me and continued to shine in my face. my husband saw this and blamed it on the moon but what i want to know is how can the moon stay in one spot for 2-2 1/2 hours and only move once i did. my son and i looked out of the front door to see where the light was coming from and it was just in front of our house right above the trees. i was very scared and unable to sleep for a very long time. now we have seen them so many times that we no longer are afraid. but we dont want to be alone outside at night!
content.summary: Several we see them very frequently

content.detailedDescription: I was told to go outside by a friend because his mom had seen something at her house. i went into my parents' front yard and stood out there for about 20 min. within 5 minutes i saw an oject moving through the sky. the object has white, yellow and red lights flashing sequentially  and flying in a straight pattern in the ne sky. the object appeared to wobble a little moving side to side. it was moving much much faster than any plane i had ever seen at night. i then saw another object do the exact same thing about five minutes later, although this object was moving a little slower. i lost sight of both ojects as they moved through the sky and behind my parents house and were then masked by a hill.
content.summary: Saw white/red/yellowish lights flashing in a systematic pattern. flying very fast, much faster than any plane. seemed to wobble a little.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at 10:00 p.M.  heading east on 68 highway with a close friend when the car in front of us slowed down to a 10 mph crawl.   hovering above the road near the power lines on the north side of the road a thick black triangle object with three lights, one on each point and a band of lights on what seemed to be the back of the craft.  we stopped (along with the car ahead of us )  and watched the craft 'float' north making no noise.  this thing was close, like a football field away close so trust me this is not some idiot reporting a stealth bomber or ambiguous distant light.  i could damn near touch the thing!  i cannot stress enough how clearly we could see this slow, slow moving air ship/ ufo/ whatever.  so after at least a solid sixty seconds it kept slowly hovering silently north and then when it was 500-600 yards away it 'blinked out'  totally gone...No vapor or exhaust trail or noise of any kind.  just some local honest hard working people with their minds blown parked on the side of 2 line kansas highway.   whether it's e.T. or just some black budget military project it's real people!
content.summary: Driving home on 68 hwy  with a friend when the car in front of us slowed down to a 10 mph craw.  signaled to pass and saw a thick black triangle object hovering over the road.

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my husband and my son all witnessed a light in the sky which seemed to grow in size and brightness at times. at times it took on an almost "ghostly" blue hazy appearance.It flew across the horizon very quickly in a straight line, then changed direction and seemed to hover at times. at other times it seemed to move in an elliptical flight path. my son suggested getting flashlights and flashing to see if we might get it's attention. i flashed the light five times, paused, then flashed five more times. immediately the light seemed to increase in size as if it were coming closer to us. i was astonished at what seemed to be a response from the light and it started to move in a "u" shaped path, back and forward, dipping and going back. this type of behavior was observed for at least 90 minutes, one witness says it was 3 hours. the light was not active during the entire time. there were times when the light would hold position for a long time, then suddenly start moving again. this event was also witnessed the next night by the same people at the same location and by our grandson who was in the next county at an outdoor halloween event.
content.summary: Light in the horizon changing direction and brightness.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter (10) told me if she's standing on the living room window there is something in the air.  i asked her if it is a airplane or helicopter or ballon , she said no, nothing, something others. i searched for myself this object through the window and found out she's right.  i call my wife and she came and saw the same object.  we opened the window and looked through a telescope and then i took the camera and did some photos.  the object looks like a probe and we all have never seen such a object in the sky before.
the object rotate slowly and has sometimes a butterfly look. it looks like not made on earth so to speak.  we run on the highest floor in our house to see more, we could see this object around 5 minute and we lost it in the landscape.
content.summary: Sighting of ufo flyby

content.detailedDescription: Viewed on wave 3 news tv louisville, kentucky near louisville interinaitional airporort south side video sent in by viewer plus thousands of calls to news room please addres this. thank you
content.summary: Flashing colors 2 objects 1 disappered

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30pm october 22,1996 i was in my backyard cleaning up after a barbecue.All of a sudden i glanced up at the sky and was amazed at the site. there was a diamond-like object extremely large in size with colorful bright lights within the shape which did not reflet out of the object.Suddenly, the object began to tilt and wobble while still traveling in a vertical, straight direction and gaining altitude. this was ongoing for a couple of minutes, i had the opportunity to spot some airplanes in a much lower altitude.The object travled vertically as opposed to the horizontal planes and its size was visibly much larger dispite its higher altitude. also when the object traveled by a large cloud it was brightly illuminated like nothing i've seen before. as the objct began to head south i watched it till it was nothing more than a tiny glowing dot in the sky. it has been 15 years since the encounter, i have told many friends and family but they are reluctant to believe me. i am open to questioning and futher investigation to confirm that my statements are true.
content.summary: Diamond-like object with colorful lights traveling vertically

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home shortly after midnight going west on harrison street.  as i approached 42nd street i noticed 2 bright lights in the sky somewhat close to one another and that they were not moving as a plane normally does.  as i passed 42nd street, i noticed that the object was still not moving.  it was in the sky - i would say less than 500 feet above me.  the wings were not like normal planes, instead they extended from the body a short distance and then they were vertical at the ends.  i also noticed what i thought were small tiny greenish/blue flourescent lights that seemed to drop a small distance and then disappear.  there were also lights on the bottom of the craft that were shaped like an arrow (<) that pointed towards what i assume was the front of the object.  as i neared 48th street i kept turning around to view it and as i decided to get out of my car, it slowly headed east away from the direction i was in.
content.summary: A hovering object w/good detail and two bright lights on the front.

content.detailedDescription: many years ago i saw something as i still wonder today, i saw no object but a marked off landing area for something. this was in a wooded area where i noticed a chalked in what looked like a landing pad for something. the chalk was all in green as there were chairs seated in front of a stage. i thought something very small may have landed, as i noticed that mercury was high in the 5 am morning sky.
content.summary: Saw a landing filed etched out in green chalk that had a lot of chairs for viewing out in the woods

content.detailedDescription: Observed strange object hovering near t.V. broadcast tower in richmond, va. sighting took place the same day the largest earthquake ever recorded struck virginia. shot detailed video of strange light for about 10 minutes before object flew out of sight. object exhibited a flight path that was erratic and not possible by conventional aircraft. strange blinking lights on the object were also observed.  still in possession of video, have field agent contact me for a copy.
content.summary: Observed object blinking strange lights and shot video

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed many events, some near actual planes. with no doubt i am sure pilots have seen them too for as close as they are. at one time it was almost as if they were going to crash. i have seen as many as 5 at one time, just hovering spinning colors. i have also witnessed something like a huge spot light in the sky that turned on and off.
content.summary: I have been watching these for years from my backyrad, every clear night.

content.detailedDescription: Last evening after dark, our dog was at the back door and wanted in the house. this was odd. he never wants to come in. so i left him in and b___ went out on the patio to pick up a few things. almost immediately i heard him calling me to come see. i hurried outside and we watched these strange orange lights through the trees coming from the south. when we realized they were flying towards us, we stood there and watched in amazement as a whole fleet flew over us. they were glowing orange around the outside, the center, and inner spokes like a wheel and made absolutely no sound. first three of them in a triangle formation, then clusters of two, three, four, then one at a time. as they flew over head, we tried to take some pictures with a cell phone. the time was 8:43 pm. we watched them for about 5 minutes. some disappeared into the night sky as they flew over. either they got higher or went above the clouds, or just vanished. we could see stars in the sky, but these flying objects were much larger, much lower and much brighter. they all had a shape, or structure, like a wheel, which was glowing bright orange, and they were flying to the north, not hovering, not floating, not zigzagging. but flying in a direct line to the north. these were not airplanes or helicopters. they were much larger, very different in shape and size, and made no noise.  after they were gone, we watched for a while and checked later, but didn't see them anymore. we downloaded the photos and looked at them. they show the glowing orbs, not the distinct outline of lights that we actually saw. i never thought i'd see something like this. in my opinion, these were ufo's.
content.summary: Large wheel shaped discs flew south to north over our backyard last evening. outside edge, center  and spokes glowing orange. no sound. groups of 3 or 4 at a time, then one at a time in a straight line. when directly overhead, some disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were out star-gazing when i noticed a light that seemed to be blinking red and white light. it was a light right above the tree tops that was blinking white than red.  we thought it was a star at first, but we kept watching it and s when we saw it moving.  it was far away, but wecould see it moving slowly.  it moved in a straight line, stop, than rise.  it did that several times, than it became motionless.  we watched it for a while, maybe an hour.  we tried to take pics and video, but i guess it was to far away because nothing showed up.  this was at night.  eventually we left because it was getting late.  when we got home, my brother called and said that shot straight up and lined up with other stars.  we went back te following night but we saw nothing.  there was no star where we first saw it.
content.summary: White then red blinking light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house smoking a cigarette when i saw what looked to be an extraordinarily bright airplane flying at a relatively slow rate, about the pace you'd see a typical airplane flying if not a bit slower. eventually, after roughly 5 minutes of my observation, it stopped dead. it was blinking steadily orange while it moved, but once it stopped the blinking became less frequent and the color seemed to change to its own star-like white, eventually blinking very sporadically.  by far the brightest object in the sky.  it remains stationary as i type.
content.summary: I saw an extraordinarily bright airplane flying at a relatively slow rate, about the pace you'd see a typical airplane flying but a bit slower. eventually it stopped dead

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching tv.
i went out side because there were jets flying low and it was strange because they seemed very low and i heard the dogs barking next door.
when i first noticed it i thought it was an airplane with two binking lights.
it blinked on and off and when it dissapered i thought the plane just turned its back side and i could no longer see the lights anymore.The second time i saw it after a minute i sat down again and the same lights were in the same spot again. then it dissapared .
the lights looked very high in the sky orange and redish , i was kinda of supprised and i then believed that mabey i saw a ufo.
content.summary: Two lights orange redish blinking in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver. i had just got fuel at the pilot truck stop at exit 406 interstate 20. my logbook concurs the time. the fuel card would be even more exact. i left immediately after getting fuel im headed east on i 20 toward my destination. which was our yard in fort worth.
   the sky was clear. no heavy traffic. ........... about a mile east of exit 406 a bright white light caught my eye. it was coming in from the north traveling south. at first of course i thought it was a meteor. i thought heck, i never have a wish prepared, to wish upon a falling star. but it didn't burn out. it kept going. it didn't diminish. and i thought " god help ne think of a good wish"  
   then i said to myself. "holy ______"***" is that?? omg!!
   it was about to go out view by now. it took me 30 seconds to get to the part of the freeway where it crossed. i was traveling 60 miles per hour. i've been driving for 16 years. i have seen a lot of stuff in the skies. but never anything like this. i am very good at estimating speeds and distances. i have excellent depth perception. my opinion is it was traveling about 800 miles per hour. in a straight line parallel to the ground. 500 to 1000 feet off the ground. and then it was gone. when i got to the point where i believed it crossed. i looked south and saw nothing.
   that was not a rock burning up in the atmosphere. a few minutes later. i posted on news channel 25 out of waco texas facebook my experience. that's how convinced i am. what ever it was. was real. thats what i saw. thats what i believe. eait till you see one... you will be on this site also..
content.summary: A round white llight 800 miles per hour north to south parallel to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
The time was about 840, a friend and i were about to go out on the night of 10/01/11. (saturday) while standing on the front porch, wasting a few minutes, we chatted and smoked cigarettes. 
i was facing towards the sky, looking upwards at the stars, when i spotted a large object moving. it was just at the level of low clouds. difficult to pin point the size of the object, and the distance.If i had to guess, i'd say it was as wide as two or three 727/200 jet liners (200-300 hundred feet, maybe more depending on the altitude). the total time length of the sighting was less then 30 seconds. as it disappeared in and out of the cloud cover, it was at an altitude of less then 6,500 feet. there were no sounds or smells emitting from the object. it was dark outside, and no lights on the object. it seemed to be disk shaped, but since only the front was visible within the darkness and cloud cover, it could possibly have been in the shape of a round boomerang. hard to tell, but in my opinion it seemed like a massive, dark, saucer shaped object.
when i alerted the person i was with, she turned around and saw it also.
after just the few seconds, it eventually disappeared (i would assume)into the cloud cover , and for several minutes we scanned the skies but saw nothing else. the object seemed solid,slow, and moved steadily. it didn't resemble any earth craft, nor flying geese, because geese they usually fly in a pointed v shape, and this was rounded. and there was no sound! which flying geese tend to be very noisy as they trumpet. i felt stunned and intrigued by what i saw, never having scene such a large unknown craft that blatantly close to me.
the next day my friend called,and informed me she knew someone in the same neighborhood, and had spoke with them previously that day. apparently he was out by the garage working on his car, and saw the same mysterious object, as well as his wife who was also with him.

i checked the papers/internet for the next few days, but didn't find any reporting of it. i thought the next best step to do would be to post my findings on mufon.
content.summary: Florida ufo sighting.Observed a large black disk shape slowly move through sky just under the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
About a year ago, i noticed an object in the sky while driving home. i got home and stayed outside to watch the object for about 15 minutes until if finally just faded out. i've been seeing this off and on frequently since then, and it is always appears in the same area, around the same time - 8pm. i have viewed it up to 30 minutes at times. it appears to come in from the northwest, and stops due west and hovers. it sometimes appears to gradually head south until it fades out of sight or it just fades out slowly. most of the time i see one object, but a couple of times i have seen several smaller objects around the one object moving erratically. the objects seem to project from the bigger object and surround it. there also appears to be some sort of communication with blinking of lights and synchronizing switching of positions in the sky, but i cannot determine a pattern. tonight was one of the coolest sightings because there were three big objects that were obviously communicating.  one came in and stayed hovering while another approached it and took off due south.  then another one came in and hovered beside the original, they traded position,and then the original object headed due south.  they all remained blinking different colors, and before trading positions, the colors seemed to coordinate.  at one point, the original object started to brighten before it swapped positions with the second. eventually, the last remaining object slowly dimmed until it just faded away. i've witnessed this fading away before, many times, which makes me feel like it is still there.  sometimes, i have waited and watched it reappear, and then slowly fade out again.  still, there is no pattern to how often or, if it, will reappear. i have captured some of these sightings on recording, but the camera that i have is old.  i have a new one now, but the auto settings seem to throw off the resolution from that distance, so it's frustrating.  this is a new experience to me, so i've been looking online to see if there are similar sightings, but nothing so far.

i don't know what this is. but i do know it is not an airplane, helicopter, satellite, flying star, planet, or any other flying object that i know of. i live in the country with a clear view of the texas night sky.  i can see the city lights of the closest city, and all the smaller towns in between.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Witnessing stationary, hovering, flashing, multiple, communicating unidentified flying objects in the texas night sky for over a year.

content.detailedDescription:
Amazing footage of a ufo or some type of "flying saucer" type object of sunrise, florida! this is amazing and i've never in my life seen anything like this! it would start out as a white orb connected to a red orb, then it would form into a structure that would change colors -- almost blinding -- such as green, blue, yellow, and purple! i was able to capture the structure of it which is similar to a space-ship of some sort! very similar to the "ufo china" sighting that is on youtube! this is a hot-spot for ufo's, because i often see orange orbs around here, but i have never ever seen anything to this extent before!

**watch in 1080p for much better quality**
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Ufo sighting over sunrise, florida
